name: Infection (Syanic)
description:
As of May 2nd 2021, this game is unbeatable due to a bug. Keep an eye out on updates!

Play as a virus whose aim is to break down the barriers to successfully infect the core. Death is not the end as you fling your own body at the barriers to break them down bit by bit.

Made for Oakland University's 2021 Winter Game jam, the theme was "Only one enemy"

Controls:

Movement: WASD, Arrow keys, Left Joy Stick

Fly: LMB, RT
